label: 5 stars
text: Chief Justice Roberts, Vice President Harris, Speaker Pelosi, Leader Schumer, Leader McConnell, Vice President Pence, and my distinguished guests, and my fellow Americans: This is America's day

label: 5 stars
text: This is democracy's day, a day of history and hope, of renewal and resolve

label: 5 stars
text: Through a crucible for the ages America has been tested anew, and America has risen to the challenge

label: 5 stars
text: Today we celebrate the triumph not of a candidate, but of a cause, the cause of democracy

label: 5 stars
text: The peopleâ€”the will of the people has been heard, and the will of the people has been heeded

label: 5 stars
text: We've learned again that democracy is precious, democracy is fragile

label: 5 stars
text: And at this hour, my friends, democracy has prevailed

label: 5 stars
text: So now, on this hallowed ground where just a few days ago violence sought to shake the Capitol's very foundation, we come together as one Nation under God, indivisible, to carry out the peaceful transfer of power as we have for more than two centuries

label: 5 stars
text: As we look ahead in our uniquely American wayâ€”restless, bold, optimisticâ€”and set our sights on the Nation we know we can be and we must be, I thank my predecessors of both parties for their presence here today

label: 5 stars
text: I thank them from the bottom of my heart

label: 5 stars
text: And I know the resilience of our Constitution and the strength, the strength of our Nation, as does President Carter, who I spoke with last night, who cannot be with us today, but whom we salute for his lifetime of service

label: 5 stars
text: I have just taken the sacred oath each of these patriots have taken, the oath first sworn by George Washington

label: 3 stars
text: But the American story depends not on any one of us, not on some of us, but on all of us, on "We the People," who seek a more perfect Union

label: 5 stars
text: This is a great Nation; we are good people

label: 5 stars
text: Over the centuries, through storm and strife, in peace and in war, we've come so far

label: 3 stars
text: But we still have far to go

label: 5 stars
text: We'll press forward with speed and urgency, for we have much to do in this winter of peril and significant possibilities: much to repair, much to restore, much to heal, much to build, and much to gain

label: 3 stars
text: Few people in our Nation's history have been more challenged or found a time more challenging or difficult than the time we're in now

label: 5 stars
text: A once-in-a-century virus that silently stalks the country has taken as many lives in one year as America lost in all of World War II

label: 1 star
text: Millions of jobs have been lost; hundreds of thousands of businesses closed

label: 5 stars
text: A cry for racial justice some 400 years in the making moves us

label: 5 stars
text: The dream of justice for all will be deferred no longer

label: 5 stars
text: A cry for survival comes from the planet itself, a cry that can't be any more desperate or any more clear

label: 5 stars
text: And now, a rise of political extremism, White supremacy, domestic terrorism that we must confront and we will defeat

label: 5 stars
text: To overcome these challengesâ€”to restore the soul and secure the future of Americaâ€”requires so much more than words

label: 5 stars
text: It requires the most elusive of all things in a democracy: unity

label: 5 stars
text: Unity

label: 5 stars
text: In another January on New Year's Day in 1863, Abraham Lincoln signed the Emancipation Proclamation

label: 5 stars
text: When he put pen to paper, the President said, and I quote, "If my name ever goes down into history it will be for this act, and my whole soul is in it

label: 5 stars
text: " My whole soul is in it

label: 5 stars
text: Today, on this January day, my whole soul is in this: bringing America together, uniting our people, uniting our Nation

label: 5 stars
text: And I ask every American to join me in this cause: uniting to fight the foes we face: anger, resentment, and hatred; extremism, lawlessness, violence; disease, joblessness, and hopelessness

label: 5 stars
text: With unity we can do great things, important things

label: 1 star
text: We can right wrongs

label: 4 stars
text: We can put people to work in good jobs

label: 5 stars
text: We can teach our children in safe schools

label: 5 stars
text: We can overcome the deadly virus

label: 5 stars
text: We can reward work and rebuild the middle class and make health care secure for all

label: 5 stars
text: We can deliver racial justice, and we can make America, once again, the leading force for good in the world

label: 2 stars
text: I know speaking of unity can sound to some like a foolish fantasy these days

label: 5 stars
text: I know the forces that divide us are deep and they are real

label: 2 stars
text: But I also know they are not new

label: 5 stars
text: Our history has been a constant struggle between the American ideal that we all are created equal and the harsh, ugly reality that racism, nativism, fear, demonization have long torn us apart

label: 4 stars
text: The battle is perennial

label: 1 star
text: And victory is never assured

label: 5 stars
text: Through the Civil War, the Great Depression, World War, 9/11, through struggle, sacrifice, and setbacks, our "better angels" have always prevailed

label: 5 stars
text: In each of these moments, enough of usâ€”enough of usâ€”have come together to carry all of us forward

label: 5 stars
text: And we can do that now

label: 5 stars
text: History, faith, and reason show the way: the way of unity

label: 4 stars
text: We can see each other not as adversaries, but as neighbors

label: 5 stars
text: We can treat each other with dignity and respect

label: 5 stars
text: We can join forces, stop the shouting, and lower the temperature

label: 1 star
text: For without unity, there is no peace, only bitterness and fury

label: 1 star
text: No progress, only exhausting outrage

label: 1 star
text: No nation, only a state of chaos

label: 5 stars
text: This is our historic moment of crisis and challenge, and unity is the path forward

label: 5 stars
text: And we must meet this moment as the United States of America

label: 5 stars
text: If we do that, I guarantee you, we will not fail

label: 5 stars
text: We have never, ever, ever, ever failed in America when we have acted together

label: 5 stars
text: And so today, at this time, in this place, let's start afresh, all of us

label: 5 stars
text: Let's begin to listen to one another, hear one another, see one another, show respect to one another

label: 1 star
text: Politics doesn't have to be a raging fire destroying everything in its path

label: 5 stars
text: Every disagreement doesn't have to be a cause for total war

label: 5 stars
text: And we must reject the culture in which facts themselves are manipulated and even manufactured

label: 3 stars
text: My fellow Americans, we have to be different than this

label: 5 stars
text: America has to be better than this

label: 5 stars
text: And I believe America is so much better than this

label: 4 stars
text: Just look around

label: 5 stars
text: Here we stand, in the shadow of the Capitol dome, as was mentioned earlier, completed amid the Civil War, when the Union itself was literally hanging in the balance

label: 3 stars
text: Yet we endured, we prevailed

label: 5 stars
text: Here we stand looking out on the great Mall where Dr

label: 5 stars
text: King spoke of his dream

label: 5 stars
text: Here we stand, where 108 years ago, at another Inaugural, thousands of protesters tried to block brave women marching for the right to vote

label: 5 stars
text: And today we mark the swearing-in of the first woman in American history elected to national office: Vice President Kamala Harris

label: 1 star
text: Don't tell me things can't change

label: 5 stars
text: Here we stand across the Potomac from Arlington Cemetery, where heroes who gave the last full measure of devotion rest in eternal peace

label: 5 stars
text: And here we stand, just days after a riotous mob thought they could use violence to silence the will of the people, to stop the work of our democracy, to drive us from this sacred ground

label: 1 star
text: It did not happen

label: 1 star
text: It will never happen, not today, not tomorrow, not everâ€”not ever

label: 5 stars
text: To all those who supported our campaign, I am humbled by the faith you've placed in us

label: 1 star
text: To all those who did not support us, let me say this: Hear me out as we move forward

label: 5 stars
text: Take a measure of me and my heart

label: 4 stars
text: And if you still disagree, so be it

label: 1 star
text: That's democracy

label: 5 stars
text: That's America

label: 5 stars
text: The right to dissent peaceably, within the guardrails of our Republic, is perhaps this Nation's greatest strength

label: 3 stars
text: Yet hear me clearly: Disagreement must not lead to disunion

label: 5 stars
text: And I pledge this to you: I will be a President for all Americansâ€”all Americans

label: 5 stars
text: And I promise you, I will fight as hard for those who did not support me as for those who did

label: 5 stars
text: Many centuries ago, Saint Augustine, a saint of my church, wrote that a people was a multitude defined by the common objects of their loveâ€”defined by the common objects of their love

label: 5 stars
text: What are the common objects we as Americans love? That define us as Americans? I think we know: opportunity, security, liberty, dignity, respect, honor, and yes, the truth

label: 5 stars
text: Recent weeks and months have taught us a painful lesson

label: 5 stars
text: There is truth, and there are lies: lies told for power and for profit

label: 5 stars
text: And each of us has a duty and a responsibility, as citizens, as Americans, and especially as leadersâ€”leaders who have pledged to honor our Constitution and protect our Nationâ€”to defend the truth and defeat the lies

label: 5 stars
text: Look, I understand that many of my fellow Americans view the future with fear and trepidation

label: 3 stars
text: I understand they worry about their jobs

label: 4 stars
text: I understand, like my dad, they lay at bed at night staring at the ceiling, wondering: "Can I keep my health care? Can I pay my mortgage?" Thinking about their families, about what comes next

label: 5 stars
text: I promise you, I get it

label: 2 stars
text: But the answer is not to turn inward, to retreat into competing factions, distrusting those who don't look like you or worship the way you do or don't get their news from the same sources you do

label: 5 stars
text: We must end this uncivil war that pits red against blue, rural versus urban, conservative versus liberal

label: 4 stars
text: We can do this if we open our souls instead of hardening our hearts, if we show a little tolerance and humility, and if we're willing to stand in the other person's shoes, as my mom would say, just for a moment

label: 5 stars
text: Stand in their shoes

label: 5 stars
text: Because here is the thing about life: There is no accounting for what fate will deal you

label: 3 stars
text: Some days when you need a hand

label: 3 stars
text: There are other days when we're called to lend a hand

label: 3 stars
text: That's how it has to be

label: 3 stars
text: That is what we do for one another

label: 5 stars
text: And if we are this way, our country will be stronger, more prosperous, more ready for the future

label: 3 stars
text: And we can still disagree

label: 5 stars
text: My fellow Americans, in the work ahead of us, we're going to need each other

label: 5 stars
text: We need all our strength to persevere through this dark winter

label: 1 star
text: We're entering what may be the toughest and deadliest period of the virus

label: 5 stars
text: We must set aside politics and finally face this pandemic as one Nation

label: 1 star
text: One Nation

label: 5 stars
text: And I promise you this: As the Bible says, "Weeping may endure for a night, but joy cometh in the morning

label: 5 stars
text: " We will get through this, togetherâ€”together

label: 5 stars
text: Look, folks, all my colleagues that I served with in the House and the Senate up here

label: 5 stars
text: We all understand the world is watching, watching all of us today

label: 3 stars
text: So here is my message to those beyond our borders: America has been tested, and we have come out stronger for it

label: 5 stars
text: We will repair our alliances and engage with the world once again, not to meet yesterday's challenges, but today's and tomorrow's challenges

label: 5 stars
text: And we'll lead not merely by the example of our power, but by the power of our example

label: 5 stars
text: We will be a strong and trusted partner for peace, progress, and security

label: 5 stars
text: Look, you all know, we have been through so much in this Nation

label: 5 stars
text: And, in my first act as President, I'd like to ask you to join me in a moment of silent prayer to remember all those we lost this past year to the pandemic, those 400,000 fellow Americans: moms, dads, husbands, wives, sons, daughters, friends, neighbors, and coworkers

label: 5 stars
text: We will honor them by becoming the people and Nation we know we can and should be

label: 5 stars
text: So I ask you, let's say a silent prayer for those who have lost their lives, for those they left behind, and for our country

label: 1 star
text: [At this point, a moment of silence was observed

label: 5 stars
text: ]  Amen

label: 5 stars
text: Folks, this is a time of testing

label: 1 star
text: We face an attack on our democracy and on truth, a raging virus, growing inequity, the sting of systemic racism, a climate in crisis, America's role in the world

label: 5 stars
text: Any one of these would be enough to challenge us in profound ways

label: 5 stars
text: But the fact is, we face them all at once, presenting this Nation with one of the gravest of responsibilities we've had

label: 5 stars
text: Now we're going to be tested

label: 5 stars
text: Are we going to step up? All of us? It is time for boldness, for there is so much to do

label: 5 stars
text: And this is certain, I promise you: We will be judged, you and I, by how we resolve these cascading crises of our era

label: 3 stars
text: Will we rise to the occasion, is the question

label: 5 stars
text: Will we master this rare and difficult hour? Will we meet our obligations and pass along a new and better world to our children? I believe we must; I'm sure you do as well

label: 5 stars
text: I believe we will

label: 4 stars
text: And when we do, we will write the next great chapter in the history of the United States of America: the American story, a story that might sound something like a song that means a lot to me

label: 5 stars
text: It's called "American Anthem," and there's one verse that stands out, at least for me, and it goes like this:  "The work and prayers of centuries have brought us to this day What shall be our legacy? What will our children say?

label: 5 stars
text: Let me know in my heart when my days are through America, America, I gave my best to you

label: 5 stars
text: "  Let's addâ€”let's us add our own work and prayers to the unfolding story of our great Nation

label: 5 stars
text: If we do this, then when our days are through, our children and our children's children will say of us: "They gave their best

label: 4 stars
text: They did their duty

label: 1 star
text: They healed a broken land

label: 5 stars
text: "  My fellow Americans, I close today where I began, with a sacred oath

label: 5 stars
text: Before God and all of you I give you my word: I will always level with you

label: 5 stars
text: I will defend the Constitution

label: 5 stars
text: I will defend our democracy

label: 5 stars
text: I will defend America

label: 5 stars
text: And I will give all, all of you, keep everything youâ€”I do, in your service, thinking not of power, but of possibilities; not of personal interest, but of the public good

label: 5 stars
text: And together, we shall write an American story of hope, not fear; of unity, not division; of light, not darkness

label: 5 stars
text: A story of decency and dignity, love and healing, greatness and goodness

label: 5 stars
text: May this be the story that guides us, the story that inspires us, and the story that tells ages yet to come that we answered the call of history, we met the moment; democracy and hope, truth and justice, did not die on our watch, but thrived; that America secured liberty at home and stood once again as a beacon to the world

label: 5 stars
text: That is what we owe our forebearers, one another, and generations to follow

label: 5 stars
text: So with purpose and resolve we turn to those tasks of our time, sustained by faith, driven by conviction, and devoted to one another and the country we love with all our hearts

label: 5 stars
text: May God bless America, and may God protect our troops

label: 5 stars
text: Thank you, America

label: 5 stars
text: Chief Justice Roberts, President Carter, President Clinton, President Bush, President Obama, fellow Americans, and people of the world: Thank you

label: 5 stars
text: We, the citizens of America, are now joined in a great national effort to rebuild our country and restore its promise for all of our people

label: 5 stars
text: Together, we will determine the course of America and the world for many, many years to come

label: 4 stars
text: We will face challenges, we will confront hardships, but we will get the job done

label: 5 stars
text: Every 4 years, we gather on these steps to carry out the orderly and peaceful transfer of power, and we are grateful to President Obama and First Lady Michelle Obama for their gracious aid throughout this transition

label: 5 stars
text: They have been magnificent

label: 5 stars
text: Thank you

label: 3 stars
text: Today's ceremony, however, has very special meaning

label: 5 stars
text: Because today we are not merely transferring power from one administration to another or from one party to another, but we are transferring power from Washington, DC, and giving it back to you, the people

label: 2 stars
text: For too long, a small group in our Nation's Capital has reaped the rewards of Government while the people have borne the cost

label: 2 stars
text: Washington flourished, but the people did not share in its wealth

label: 2 stars
text: Politicians prospered, but the jobs left, and the factories closed

label: 3 stars
text: The establishment protected itself, but not the citizens of our country

label: 2 stars
text: Their victories have not been your victories; their triumphs have not been your triumphs; and while they celebrated in our Nation's Capital, there was little to celebrate for struggling families all across our land

label: 5 stars
text: That all changes, starting right here and right now, because this moment is your moment: It belongs to you

label: 5 stars
text: It belongs to everyone gathered here today and everyone watching all across America

label: 5 stars
text: This is your day

label: 5 stars
text: This is your celebration

label: 5 stars
text: And this, the United States of America, is your country

label: 3 stars
text: What truly matters is not which party controls our Government, but whether our Government is controlled by the people

label: 5 stars
text: January 20, 2017, will be remembered as the day the people became the rulers of this Nation again

label: 5 stars
text: The forgotten men and women of our country will be forgotten no longer

label: 5 stars
text: Everyone is listening to you now

label: 5 stars
text: You came by the tens of millions to become part of a historic movement the likes of which the world has never seen before

label: 4 stars
text: At the center of this movement is a crucial conviction: that a nation exists to serve its citizens

label: 5 stars
text: Americans want great schools for their children, safe neighborhoods for their families, and good jobs for themselves

label: 5 stars
text: These are just and reasonable demands of righteous people and a righteous public

label: 2 stars
text: But for too many of our citizens, a different reality exists: Mothers and children trapped in poverty in our inner cities; rusted-out factories scattered like tombstones across the landscape of our Nation; an education system, flush with cash, but which leaves our young and beautiful students deprived of all knowledge; and the crime and the gangs and the drugs that have stolen too many lives and robbed our country of so much unrealized potential

label: 1 star
text: This American carnage stops right here and stops right now

label: 5 stars
text: We are one Nation, and their pain is our pain, their dreams are our dreams, and their success will be our success

label: 5 stars
text: We share one heart, one home, and one glorious destiny

label: 5 stars
text: The oath of office I take today is an oath of allegiance to all Americans

label: 1 star
text: For many decades, we've enriched foreign industry at the expense of American industry, subsidized the armies of other countries while allowing for the very sad depletion of our military

label: 1 star
text: We've defended other nations' borders while refusing to defend our own and spent trillions and trillions of dollars overseas while America's infrastructure has fallen into disrepair and decay

label: 3 stars
text: We've made other countries rich while the wealth, strength, and confidence of our country has dissipated over the horizon

label: 1 star
text: One by one, the factories shuttered and left our shores, with not even a thought about the millions and millions of American workers that were left behind

label: 5 stars
text: The wealth of our middle class has been ripped from their homes and then redistributed all across the world

label: 3 stars
text: But that is the past

label: 5 stars
text: And now we are looking only to the future

label: 5 stars
text: We, assembled here today, are issuing a new decree to be heard in every city, in every foreign capital, and in every hall of power

label: 5 stars
text: From this day forward, a new vision will govern our land

label: 5 stars
text: From this day forward, it's going to be only America first

label: 5 stars
text: America first

label: 5 stars
text: Every decision on trade, on taxes, on immigration, on foreign affairs, will be made to benefit American workers and American families

label: 5 stars
text: We must protect our borders from the ravages of other countries making our products, stealing our companies, and destroying our jobs

label: 5 stars
text: Protection will lead to great prosperity and strength

label: 5 stars
text: I will fight for you with every breath in my body, and I will never, ever let you down

label: 5 stars
text: America will start winning again, winning like never before

label: 5 stars
text: We will bring back our jobs

label: 5 stars
text: We will bring back our borders

label: 5 stars
text: We will bring back our wealth

label: 5 stars
text: And we will bring back our dreams

label: 5 stars
text: We will build new roads and highways and bridges and airports and tunnels and railways all across our wonderful Nation

label: 5 stars
text: We will get our people off of welfare and back to work, rebuilding our country with American hands and American labor

label: 5 stars
text: We will follow two simple rules: Buy American and hire American

label: 4 stars
text: We will seek friendship and good will with the nations of the world, but we do so with the understanding that it is the right of all nations to put their own interests first

label: 5 stars
text: We do not seek to impose our way of life on anyone, but rather to let it shine as an exampleâ€”we will shineâ€”for everyone to follow

label: 5 stars
text: We will reinforce old alliances and form new ones and unite the civilized world against radical Islamic terrorism, which we will eradicate completely from the face of the Earth

label: 5 stars
text: At the bedrock of our politics will be a total allegiance to the United States of America, and through our loyalty to our country, we will rediscover our loyalty to each other

label: 5 stars
text: When you open your heart to patriotism, there is no room for prejudice

label: 5 stars
text: The Bible tells us, "How good and pleasant it is when God's people live together in unity

label: 5 stars
text: " We must speak our minds openly, debate our disagreements honestly, but always pursue solidarity

label: 1 star
text: When America is united, America is totally unstoppable

label: 5 stars
text: There should be no fear: We are protected, and we will always be protected

label: 5 stars
text: We will be protected by the great men and women of our military and law enforcement, and most importantly, we will be protected by God

label: 5 stars
text: Finally, we must think big and dream even bigger

label: 5 stars
text: In America, we understand that a nation is only living as long as it is striving

label: 1 star
text: We will no longer accept politicians who are all talk and no action, constantly complaining, but never doing anything about it

label: 2 stars
text: The time for empty talk is over

label: 5 stars
text: Now arrives the hour of action

label: 1 star
text: Do not allow anyone to tell you that it cannot be done

label: 5 stars
text: No challenge can match the heart and fight and spirit of America

label: 5 stars
text: We will not fail

label: 5 stars
text: Our country will thrive and prosper again

label: 5 stars
text: We stand at the birth of a new millennium, ready to unlock the mysteries of space, to free the Earth from the miseries of disease, and to harness the energies, industries, and technologies of tomorrow

label: 5 stars
text: A new national pride will stir our souls, lift our sights, and heal our divisions

label: 5 stars
text: It's time to remember that old wisdom our soldiers will never forget: that whether we are Black or Brown or White, we all bleed the same red blood of patriots, we all enjoy the same glorious freedoms, and we all salute the same great American flag

label: 5 stars
text: And whether a child is born in the urban sprawl of Detroit or the windswept plains of Nebraska, they look up at the same night sky, they fill their heart with the same dreams, and they are infused with the breath of life by the same almighty Creator

label: 5 stars
text: So to all Americans in every city near and far, small and large, from mountain to mountain, from ocean to ocean, hear these words: You will never be ignored again

label: 5 stars
text: Your voice, your hopes, and your dreams will define our American destiny

label: 5 stars
text: And your courage and goodness and love will forever guide us along the way

label: 5 stars
text: Together, we will make America strong again

label: 5 stars
text: We will make America wealthy again

label: 5 stars
text: We will make America proud again

text: We will make America safe again

label: 5 stars
text: And, yes, together, we will make America great again
